TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 929
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to James F Perry, 02-24-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to James F. Perry, February 24, 1833. Concerning purchase of a slave for $600.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 929

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, February 24, 1833. Concerning purchase of a slave for $600.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-24-1833">Feb. 24,1833*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Hunter */person_mentioned*has a very valuable*person_mentioned* mulatto man*/person_mentioned*, he wants to sell him asks six hundred dollars I think him very cheap and if you have any means in *location_mentioned*Missouri */location_mentioned*or can make any trade with *person_mentioned*Hunter */person_mentioned*to get him I think he would suit you very well— he is a *person_mentioned*slave */person_mentioned*for life as he was brought into the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*by old*person_mentioned* Best*/person_mentioned* before the time for bringing them in expired-— he would suit you very well indeed— perhaps you can make some arrangement to get him, try and do it—*/p*
*p*I am sorry you have lost so many goods I think that farming or planting is much the safest business in the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I will be down in a few days*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr James F. Perry*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Peach point */location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr Hunter*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
